channel.title: 3 Paladins in game
channel.description: #### What happened? We have 3 paladins in game #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I have no idea(I'm pretty sure we are only supposed to have 2) #### Steps to reproduce: Cult game have 1 guaranteed paladin with 2 random paladins #### Comments: Im pretty sure this happened because of the change as if you have 1 guaranteed paladin and 2 others spawn as randoms then you get 3. https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/385279299596320768/407969289078046740/unknown.png

item.title: 3 Paladins in game
item.dc:creator: DeathReaperRH
item.description:
What happened?

We have 3 paladins in game

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

I have no idea(I’m pretty sure we are only supposed to have 2)

Steps to reproduce:

Cult game have 1 guaranteed paladin with 2 random paladins

Comments:

Im pretty sure this happened because of the change as if you have 1 guaranteed paladin and 2 others spawn as randoms then you get 3.
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/385279299596320768/407969289078046740/unknown.png

Read full topic
